A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been a Star Wars fanboy for most of my life and this movie surprised me in almost every way.   As much as The Force Awakens was A New Hope remake this took everything about Empire and did it differently. Every time I thought I knew what was going to happen they went a different direction.  I've read about some of the under tones of the movie but I didn't see them.  Go in with an open mind and this is one of the best Star Wars movies ever.
